channel.title: Scott Mills Daily
channel.description: A daily slice of Scott, with more silly features, crank calls and plenty of attempts to make you laugh.
channel.itunes:summary: A daily slice of Scott, with more silly features, crank calls and plenty of attempts to make you laugh.
channel.itunes:author: BBC Radio 1
channel.itunes:keywords: comedy, radio, scott, mills, mils, scot, radio1
channel.media:keywords: comedy, radio, scott, mills, mils, scot, radio1

item.title: Mills: The Midnight Beast 25 Oct 11
item.description: This is DESC. Our friends The Midnight Beast pop in for a chat. Scott's got some advice for people planning on photoshopping their partners in pics... they won't like it. Plus, he's had it less than a week but Scott's already broken his new phone.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is SUB. Our friends The Midnight Beast pop in for a chat. Scott's got some advice for people planning on photoshopping their partners in pics... they won't like it. Plus, he's had it less than a week but Scott's already broken his new phone....
item.itunes:summary: This is SUMM. Our friends The Midnight Beast pop in for a chat. Scott's got some advice for people planning on photoshopping their partners in pics... they won't like it. Plus, he's had it less than a week but Scott's already broken his new phone.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio 1

item.title: Mills: Olly Murs and Jason Byrne 21 Oct 11
item.description: This is DESC. We get Olly Murs to play Truth or Dare and comedian Jason Byrne also pops in for a chat. Plus, Beccy's entering an eating competition, the diva demands of celebrities and the Posh Radio 4 lady reads your Dear Scotts.
item.itunes:subtitle: This is SUBTITLE. We get Olly Murs to play Truth or Dare and comedian Jason Byrne also pops in for a chat. Plus, Beccy's entering an eating competition, the diva demands of celebrities and the Posh Radio 4 lady reads your Dear Scotts....
item.itunes:summary: This is SUMMARY. We get Olly Murs to play Truth or Dare and comedian Jason Byrne also pops in for a chat. Plus, Beccy's entering an eating competition, the diva demands of celebrities and the Posh Radio 4 lady reads your Dear Scotts.
item.itunes:author: BBC Radio 1

item.title: Mills: Deborah Meaden and Robbie Savage 20 Oct 11
item.description: Deborah pops in to give us our job interview feedback and Robbie finally gets Scott to talk about football. Plus, the cosmetic surgery game, gossip from Scott's toilet and Beccy's mini meltdown over a dog hanging out of a car window.
item.itunes:subtitle: Deborah pops in to give us our job interview feedback and Robbie finally gets Scott to talk about football. Plus, the cosmetic surgery game, gossip from Scott's toilet and Beccy's mini meltdown over a dog hanging out of a car window....
